attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the government accept Global Warming is a natural phenomenon. It is enhanced by the increased radiation  caused by massive new house building in this country and has nothing to do with man made emissions. CO2 emissions are looked after by nature's thermostat, precipitation, and all taxes to try and combat these emissions are a fraud and detrimental to the economy.

rejection.details: Your name has been identified in the petition.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
